message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DS 

This paper is about constructing a new IR test collection using active learning strategies. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also discusses sampling strategies to mitigate class imbalance, which is a common problem in machine learning, suggesting that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses automatic classification of relevance, which could fall under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The use of active learning strategies also suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper reports experiments on four TREC collections, indicating that it could belong to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) as well.
